topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade (Beta): Viewing Your Network

body.p: The Network Topology screen is a physical representation of your network configuration.
Your network looks similar to the following diagram.
Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard and click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Network Topology link.

A router (here, labeled Router 1) is attached to the external network (labeled Ext-Net) so the internal network (labeled Network1) can be reached from the Internet. A Network1 is attached to the router.
